title: Technological frames in public administration: What do public managers think of big data?
research_description: The article explores public managers' perceptions of big data in public administration, uncovering various cognitive frames related to big data adoption.
research_results: The study identified nine different cognitive frames ranging from techno-enthusiasts to techno-skeptics, revealing diverse views on the potential and risks of big data.
future_research: Future research should explore how these technological frames evolve over time and their impact on big data implementation in different countries.
